author: Andrew Cohen
title: A grim nursing home discovery demands answers. An unconventional strategy may help.
description: We are now seeing the first stirrings of the ways private citizens will use the courts, and the rule of law, to seek answers and accountability.
content: We don't yet know whether and to what extent the public officials responsible for America's too-little, too-late response to the coronavirus will ever be held accountable for their dereliction of duty. We don't know for sure what the congressional oversight p… [+6349 chars]
